verbs.description: “ [ARG0: I] [V: mean] , I get nothing but bad publicity . I say , how is that possible , ” Trump said .
“ I mean , [ARG0: I] [V: get] [ARG1: nothing but bad publicity] . I say , how is that possible , ” Trump said .
“ I mean , I get nothing but bad publicity . [ARG0: I] [V: say] , [ARG1: how is that possible] , ” Trump said .
“ I mean , I get nothing but bad publicity . I say , [ARGM-MNR: how] [V: is] [ARG1: that] [ARG2: possible] , ” Trump said .
“ [ARG1: I mean , I get nothing but bad publicity . I say , how is that possible] , ” [ARG0: Trump] [V: said] .
